item.title: Violent Python Chapter #1 Part 1
item.description: Violent Python Chapter #1 I’ll try to post a some excerpts about the book Violent Python here. This posts references the first part of chapter #1. In chapter one you work on three mini projects: Vulnerability Scanner The Cuckoo’s egg Zip file Cracker The first exercise aims to build a vulnerability scanner. You are supposed to read full of vulnerable program definitions and compare it against services running in a remote server.
